website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option when you only need basic television signal reception without any satellite.
pros: Omni-directional design makes it easy to get a good TV signal virtually anywhere you drive your RV
The design is also extremely aerodynamic so it won't drastically impact the fuel efficiency on long trips
cons: Plastic outer shell is prone to denting and scratching at high speeds

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. The wires are marked by molded in ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. The wires are marked by molded in labels, very nice. I have not taken this on a trip as yet, but, the reception in my driveway is excellent, towers about 20 miles away. The included amplifier is way above anything else I have seen so don't skimp and keep the old RV Cable/antenna switch, this one is the real deal. Even has video outs. One thing to note, some instructions say there is a large plastic nut to tighten on the neck, not needed on this model with large stainless screws through the neck. Overall vey pleased so far. I was not paid anything nor did I receive anything for this review.
customer_reviews.author: John in Palm Coast

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a rotating antenna on my RV with this unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a rotating antenna on my RV with this unit and now receive signals I didn't know existed in my area. Only concern I have is it sits lower on the roof than the AC unit and the effect it has on signals in that direction.
customer_reviews.author: bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Wooks great
customer_reviews.text: Works great I was able to pick up stations that even my older home antenna doesn't. It will be nice not having to raise my RV antenna and trying to find a signal. I was even able to use the existing amp in my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Ronna

customer_reviews.title: Works great & installs in our camper easy.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple installation, on our truck camper. Wired up and tested with over 30 channels in my location i could only pull 2 or 3 with a flat antenna in the window. Also our truck camper has a metal roof and this antenna comes with an FM antenna also for the radio ! We used butyl tape under it and eternabond on top to water seal it.
customer_reviews.author: 352 Gates, llc

customer_reviews.title: But so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this antenna to replace a broken Winegard (Bat wing) crank up antenna. The bracket mounting the antenna to my roof broke. After figuring out a way to remove the old hardware and then mount this on the existing hardware (with out removing the metal plate from the roof), I used the amplifier already in the RV, I was very surprised to detect 56 channels while setting my drive way. I have yet to determine how well it work in non-urban areas. But so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Toupin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: My motorhome had an old style batwing type tv antenna. I wanted to replace it and thought it would be nice to not have to crank it up and down and rotate it to reciever channels. I read the reviews and decided on the 1byone. In my driveway I could reciever 18 channels with the old batwing. I hooked up the 1byone and got 6 channels. I will be replacing my old batwing style antenna with the newest model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E

customer_reviews.title: Great trouble free replacement
customer_reviews.text: Apparently the stock batwing is not made to take a hit from a tree limb at full mast. Lol. This antenna is a great replacement for the stock one and you dont have to remember to put it down. DO NOT USE THE POWER AMP IF YOUR CAMPER ALREADY HAS ONE. hooking both of them inline will fry the antenna after a few min. And you will give it a 1 star. This will do as good as a batwing and not need to fool with directing it. I am very good with electonics but I gave this 4 stars because anyone could install this if it had instructions. Why don't you have instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Antenna, Good Reception
customer_reviews.text: Installed this unit on my motorhome to replace the old wind up type antenna. Worked like a champ. Was able to cover the entire hole on the roof with the base of the unit and it screwed nicely onto the roof. Once installed, it was no higher than the A/C units so had no worries about increasing the height of the motorhome. Wonderful reception. Was pulling TV stations from 60 to 70 miles away. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hammerboy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my old antenna on a 2003 motorhome. I receive a lot more channels(although with an a antenna most of them are channels I don't watch) and the local channels are clear with no pixelation. I like having the 360 degree so it doesn't have to be aimed. I don't know how long it will last but I bought the extended warranty for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Narrington

customer_reviews.title: This antenna works great!
customer_reviews.text: Really good reception, amplifier that comes with it really works. A significant increase in signal strength. Don't forget when assessing these antenna's your location [elevation, line to sight with transmitter] makes a difference in reception. When vehicle parked at home, I get 33 tv channels, our elevation is 570 ft above see level, Parked down by the river, I barely get half of the stations. So your location is critical. I think the product works great! We'll see how the plastics hold up against the UV. Purchased a home antenna from this same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN ROUSSEAU

customer_reviews.title: Excellent antenna. picked up around 40 channels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent antenna. picked up around 40 channels. Reception much better than I have in the house. I have no negative on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new antennae is perfect and I think the lower profile and lack of ...
customer_reviews.text: My new antennae is perfect and I think the lower profile and lack of "wings" may keep it from blowing off. I am picking up 6 more channels than before.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Harper

customer_reviews.title: I love the one I have and I'm assuming this one ...
customer_reviews.text: This Antenna is for an RV or Boat and I mistakenly ordered it instead of the one for indoor/.outdoor use. They are both 1 byone and I returned this one and ordered the correct one. I love the one I have and I'm assuming this one does a good job as well.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Do any of these work?
customer_reviews.text: After further investigation into why I can't get a signal I found out that it was my new led TVs at fault. Purchased different TVs and wow I'm now receiving 30 + channel's. Many thanks for your great antenna that seems to equal or better than king.
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Easy to use, no fuss no muss.
customer_reviews.text: Smokes the old crank up antenna! This gets at least 3x's as many channels and they are mostly very clear, plus it's omni-directional. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Revell

customer_reviews.title: Easily attached to the old mount on the camper. I wish the cord was a little shorter, but worked just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, packaged well. The antenna works well, picks up the channels the last one did. The last one worked well and was only replaced because I wanted a stronger antenna. I honestly will not know until next month how much better this antenna will be. I used the old power supply and will keep the new one as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Craftyos2

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! Best of all I tested. Worked perfect even mounted inside the fiberglass Hi-top on my Van. Got more channels and better quality than several others in this price range. The Only thing to mention is to read the instructions carefully. There are provisions for several other inputs and outputs that need to be done correctly
customer_reviews.author: Questorfla

customer_reviews.title: Lots of channels
customer_reviews.text: OMG! More channels on the road than we’ve ever had! And no fussing with turning to get a station! Best motor home investment we’ve ever bought ! I have noticed it will blip a bit when going in and out but it comes right back
customer_reviews.author: Janet Warner

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we sold the travel trailer we had installed it on and haven't gotten around to replacing the one we have on our new 5th wheel. On the definite to do list for next season.
customer_reviews.author: ladydi

customer_reviews.title: not good for customer relations
customer_reviews.text: got the one. installed as directed. nothing... returned & received another one. NOTHING YET. had a rv tech guy out and said it was hooked up right. have not moved coach as of yet. will let you know with in two weeks when we leave for the winter. I had ask 4 questions, three times , but all I got from your support was follow directions. would not/ answer or did not know the answers. just blew off the questions. not good for customer relations.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I am an unbiased reviewer of this product. Of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an unbiased reviewer of this product. Of the stations I received before I installed this antenna the picture was clearer less pixelation. I also can receive more stations with the farthest being about 60 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Jolynn Benner

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade the product
customer_reviews.text: Hardware should be stainless steel since it's going to be in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Shady 46

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement rv antenna
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement rv antenna. Old OEM antenna picked up 4 stations and this picks up 38 with camper not moved.
customer_reviews.author: Sawduster

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good but had to cut a groove in side to allow cable to pass through
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fischer

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: does what its suppose to don't have to move it like rabbit ears haven't went anywhere yet just in driveway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well I'm a good distance from any broadcast tower
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. As advertised, works well I'm a good distance from any broadcast tower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RV Antenna Replacement
customer_reviews.text: east to install, used existing mount, price was good, seems too be made well
customer_reviews.author: bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: Vary happy: )
customer_reviews.text: WOW I went from 32 channels found to 48 and I'm still using the old amp. Vary happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Brancaleoni

customer_reviews.title: Mine is a dud!
customer_reviews.text: Mine does not work. Wingard bat wing picked up 19 stations. This one only picked up 7 which happened to be the closest and strongest stations. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MBB30809

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward install and works great! I love not having to deal raising/lowering the old bat-wind antenna!
customer_reviews.author: T. McClenaghan

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit. Did not work as advertised. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berquist

customer_reviews.title: Pulls in a lot of stations!
customer_reviews.text: We mounted it on our RV and can watch TV almost anywhere now! Great antenna!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Put on living quarters horse trailer. Doesn’t pick up channels very good and fm is worse than cheap auto antenna
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: DOSEN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: I AM SITTING IN MOSES LAKE WASH. INSTALLED THIS ANTENNA, ZERO CHANNELS ! PUT THEOLD WINEGARD BAT WING BACK ON (USING THE SAME WIRING) GOT 11 CHANNELS . MODERN TECHNOLOGY ???
customer_reviews.author: michael d holm

customer_reviews.title: Waste of MY money
customer_reviews.text: Worked for hours to hook up. Never worked. Waste of MY money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Wilma

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful antenna that picks up HD stations with remarkable quality. We pick up 20-30 station in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not pick up reception as well as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking antenna
customer_reviews.text: Easy install Didn't make any difference than the one I had Same amount of channels Better looking than the one I had
customer_reviews.author: Jim China Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed and found channels simply
customer_reviews.text: This product has been everything it claimed to be. Easily installed and found channels simply. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work very well
customer_reviews.text: I replaced it with a directional antenna and now I get 30 channels, not three
customer_reviews.author: Big Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and nice quality,unable to install and use till weather gets better.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Put it on our RV to replace old one. Picks up clear signals! We Are Happy!
customer_reviews.author: DL from Northern Az

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for campers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Picked up 60+ channels. Put it on my camper, now no more forgetting to drop or raise the antenna. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Kuhaneck

customer_reviews.title: Works no better then my other 30$ antenna
customer_reviews.text: Weak plastic! Works no better then my other 30$ antenna. Would not buy!
customer_reviews.author: supreme-master

customer_reviews.title: a decent OTA tv antenna
customer_reviews.text: a decent OTA tv antenna... the main pigtail was of an inconvenient lenght, too long to curl up in the base but too short to get through the roof... if it was 6inches shorter the install effort would have improved 100% for me.... real test will come on the road...
customer_reviews.author: J&V

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it a lot. We will see how it holds up after a few road trips. It works best in the amplified mode, which improves the signal
customer_reviews.author: fantasea

customer_reviews.title: We are full time RVers, My wife got this ...
customer_reviews.text: We are full time RVers, My wife got this for me as a Christmas present, however we put it on our RV and we could only receive 4 stations. This was in central FL. Volusia county.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  Croach

customer_reviews.title: Not near the range claimed
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install BUT doesn't have anywhere near the advertised range! Quite frankly my flat RCA antenna from Walmart for 12.00 has better range,
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: We were able get double the local stations from this ...
customer_reviews.text: We were able get double the local stations from this antennae compared to our old one on our camper .
customer_reviews.author: Layne L.

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna! Lots of channels!
customer_reviews.text: This antenna is great! We recently bought a new horse trailer with living quarters and it had a satellite dome installed on top. We did not want to have to pay for a receiver when we may not be even watching much tv in the trailer. My husband ripped the guts out of the inside of the satellite and hooked this antenna up and put the dome back over it so you can't even tell we changed anything. The antenna works great! Plugged it in and we have way more channels than the house antenna gets which is mounted at least 30 feet higher in the air. Definitely recommend this antenna!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Even though I am up in the Pocono mountains I was hoping for a few channels disappointed and sad
customer_reviews.text: I could not pick up any channels, not even one. Even though I am up in the Pocono mountains I was hoping for a few channels disappointed and sad.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with performance
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Got weak signal from strong Detroit stations 35 miles away in Ann Arbor MI. Would not get any signals at 50 miles. Very disappointed with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Eakin

customer_reviews.title: A cheap alternative.  Only for camping near cities.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Winegard automatic batwing antenna that went up and down and turned from a wall switch. It quit moving automatically, so i was hoping this would replace it. Seemed like an easy choice. Much less than some other options, and Winegard had discontinued my batwing. Unfortunately, this thing only pulled in 9 channels vs to 27 i was getting with the Batwing. Since this IS for an RV, we do stay in some out of the way places, and it just won't work for me. We ended up the the Winegard Rayzar. Almost $300 more, but it works better than the batwing so far.
customer_reviews.author: old guy

customer_reviews.title: ... I cleared up my cable problem the Antenna worked great so for
customer_reviews.text: After I cleared up my cable problem the Antenna worked great so for. I have not tried it camping yet, but in my yard it works just fine. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cable is a lot harder to install than the ...
customer_reviews.text: The cable is a lot harder to install than the unit. At home I am getting 23 channels, we will see when I get on the road.
customer_reviews.author: dspin

customer_reviews.title: 1byone Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an OEM amplified power rotational HD antenna. When the OEM died I wanted an antenna that I didn't have to rotate to try to find the strongest signal. After days of searching the internet and doing comparisons with the big name brand RV antenna companies, I chose the 1byone. Wow, was I surprised at the performance of this little omnidirectional antenna. It's pulling three times the stations I was getting with my old OEM, and I know that it is getting stations from at least 55 miles from me and this is a tree lined hilly area. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: WE'RE GONNA MAKE TV "TREMENDOUSLY GREAT AGAIN" ;(
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a "tremendously great" TV antenna. It brings in all the available air broadcast stations in "tremendously great" cable quality and is easy to adjust. It says it's omni-directional but a little tweaking with the position will make a tremendously great" reception "bigly tremendously great". If you live where cable is not a viable option, this is a "tremendously great" choice. Hey Donny, Bob's yer uncle! Thanks //(~_~)\\ AU
customer_reviews.author: AU20K

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was like a dish satellite
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't what I thought it was, I thought it was like a dish satellite. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 1byone Amplified RV Antenna with Omni-directional 360° Reception, 70 Miles Outdoor HDTV Antenna Caravan TV Antenna, Suitable for Both Outdoors and RVs, Anti-UV Coating,Waterproof and Compact
product_meta.description:
1byone Outdoor HDTV Antenna 

1. Receives free broadcast High Definition TV signals (such as ABC, CBS, NBC, PBS, and Fox). Supports 1080p HD. 

2. Fast and easy set up with 3 steps - Unwrap, Plug it in and Scan channels. 

Locate Digital TV Broadcast Towers 

The distance from the broadcast towers will vary based on the location of your home. Visit www.antennapoint.com and enter your address or zip code for details about the towers near you. This information will assist in selecting the correct antenna model and aiming your antenna for the best results. 

Remarks: 

1. If you use a flat HDTV, pls go through your TV manual to make sure your TV is with built-in tuner for freeview. 

2. You should retune your Freeview TVs and digital boxes from time to time to ensure you are receiving all available services. Retuning takes only a few minutes and can be done with your remote control. 

3. Make sure your tuner is HD tuner, otherwise you can't watch HD channels. 

4. The signal quality determines how many channels you can get as well as the picture quality. After you get this antenna, hook it up to your TV, and try to find the best point to place the antenna, you can get more HD channels than you think you would. 

5. We make a commitment that all our TV antennas have a 12-month warranty. If you are not satisfied with the channels you get, please DO contact us. We will take care of your issue immediately and help you solve any problems you come across while using our antenna.
feature_bullets: Free for Life - Never Pay Your Cable or Satellite For Television Again! Omni-directional antennas receive VHF, UHF, and FM signal from every point regardless of the direction you are travelling.
Tools-free Installation - No more traditional outdoor antennas with BIG sizes, no more troubles and hassles to mount. Super compact design and super easy installation!

All Weather Proof - Anti-UV coating, waterproof and snowproof design; shielded for minimum interference, excellent performance for both digital and HDTV signal reception even in the fickle weather and terrible outdoor conditions.
High Performance - SMD technology and micro-elevtronics makes the high quality built-in amplifier, ensure the excellent antenna performance.

Buyer Guarantee - We stand behind our antenna 100% with a 12-month warranty. Please Note: Freeview reception is dependent upon environmental factors, we cannot guarantee reception in all conditions. We do offer a 30 day money back guarantee on all new items in order for you to test the suitability in your area.
